description: Speaker frequency range designation for multi-way systems. Indicates which frequency band a particular output channel is responsible for.

oneOf.description: Full Range speaker covering the entire frequency spectrum (typically 20Hz-20kHz)
Low Frequency driver (woofer) - typically handles bass frequencies
Low-Mid Frequency driver - handles lower midrange frequencies
Mid Frequency driver - handles midrange frequencies
High-Mid Frequency driver - handles upper midrange frequencies
High Frequency driver (tweeter) - handles treble frequencies

title: SpeakerWay
